metadata.Title: CVE-2014-5019 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: The multisite feature in Drupal 6.x before 6.32 and 7.x before 7.29 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service via a crafted HTTP Host header, related to determining which configuration file to use.

criterions.comment: drupal7: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
